metadata.name: HackTool - Inveigh Execution Artefacts
metadata.comment: Detects the presence and execution of Inveigh via dropped artefacts

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('3') AND (endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\inveigh-log.txt')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\inveigh-cleartext.txt')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\inveigh-ntlmv1users.txt')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\inveigh-ntlmv2users.txt')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\inveigh-ntlmv1.txt')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\inveigh-ntlmv2.txt')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\inveigh-forminput.txt')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\inveigh.dll')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\inveigh.exe')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\inveigh.ps1')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\inveigh-relay.ps1'))))

output.summary: Detects the presence and execution of Inveigh via dropped artefacts
